original_text: All the trees from Lebanon's forests are not enough to make a fire for his altar. All its animals are not enough to offer to him as burnt offerings. All the trees from Lebanon's forests are not enough to make a fire for his altar. All its animals are not enough to offer to him as burnt offerings. All the trees from Lebanon's forests are not enough
korean_text: 레바논은 땔감에도 부족하겠고 그 짐승들은 번제에도 부족할 것이라

sentences.original_text: All the trees from Lebanon's forests
are not enough to make a fire for his altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제단을 위한 불을 만들기에 충분하지 않습니다
